Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2011 03:09PM Livelaughlove30 wrote: Hey just thought I'd share, I'm now 30yrs old but was diagnosesd at the age of 24 with stage 4 metastatic breast cancer with no chance of remission,now that was six years ago. Today I can say I have been in remission for two years and the doc wants to take me off chemotherapy and just continue herceptin every three weeks!!! Ladies stay positive things can get better. Much love sister survivors
Posts.Title: Stage IV-Can you go into remission, or be cured? amontro Landerson3237
